purpose: Facilitate the conversion of OpenAPI V3 specifications into MCP server implementations.
principle: Parses OpenAPI V3 definitions and generates server code using Go, enabling seamless deployment of MCP servers.
reusability: Can be integrated as a standalone tool or within existing workflows to automate server creation from API specifications.
limitations: Limited to OpenAPI V3 specifications; may not support all custom extensions or non-standard features.
name: mcp-link
description: Convert Any OpenAPI V3 API to MCP Server
highlight: Automatically converts any OpenAPI V3 API specification into a fully functional MCP server.
